name: Pupper Express [Prototype]
description:
Delivering mail is dangerous business! All Pupper Post carriers are dedicated to making their deliveries on time and with minimal damage - whether from roving slime mold, environmental hazards, or the odd goblin.

Grid-based puzzle/action game  prototype made in Godot for My First Game Jam Summer 2021.  We'll try to finish it at some point!
Concept  and Art by Solovei; programming by Blue_Link13.
